getFactPathAlias

java.lang.String getFactPathAlias(Fact fact,
                                  java.util.Locale locale)
Return the localized full path alias of a fact. This means that if you have PurchaseOrder.OrderHeader.PaymentDetails.TotalCost it could be presented as "Order Total" which is more easily understood by an end user. Recursively use Fact.getParent, and then Fact.getAlias or Fact.getUnaliasedName to construct the full path to the fact needing aliasing.

Parameters:
fact - The fact to get the alias from.
locale - The locale to use for translation.
Returns:
The full path alias.

getLOVRetriever

LOVRetriever getLOVRetriever()
Get the object responsible for retrieving list of values on a parameter

Returns:
